required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 13, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Adherence to Treatment With PegIntron Pen Plus Rebetol in Treatment-naïve Adult Patients With Hepatitis C in Romania (Study P04247)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Adherence Rate in Patients Receiving PegIntron Pen / Rebetol for Hepatitis C

brief_summary.textblock: Adherence to the prescribed treatment regimen with PegIntron and Rebetol affects the chance of achieving a sustained virologic response in patients with hepatitis C. The objective of this study is to evaluate the proportion of patients who complete treatment with PegIntron pen and Rebetol while participating in a patient assistance program. The patient assistance program can consist of prophylactic treatment (eg, with growth factors, psychiatric medications) or other interventions (eg, psychotherapy, patient support groups, visiting nurse, nurse telephone calls, educational literature).

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects Who Completed Treatment.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at the end of the 48-week treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at the end of treatment. The prescribed treatment duration was 48 weeks.

arm_group.description: All patients participating in the study

intervention.description: PegIntron administered in accordance with approved labeling.
Rebetol administered in accordance with approved labeling

study_pop.textblock: Treatment-naïve adult patients with hepatitis C treated with PegIntron pen and Rebetol receiving a patient assistance program at approximately 40 sites in Romania. Patient assistance program can consist of prophylactic treatment (eg, with growth factors, psychiatric medications) or other interventions (eg, psychotherapy, patient support groups, visiting nurse, nurse telephone calls, educational literature).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treatment-naïve patients with hepatitis C
- Patients treated with PegIntron pen and Rebetol
- Patients receiving patient assistance program
Exclusion Criteria:
